attributes.action: review government legislation with a view to reinstating  Government of the UK by and through Christian Principles as found in The Bible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This nation has seen a steady decline in moral, ethical and social principled living since successive governments have compromised the nation by laying aside God's wisdom in favour of popularism. This process will be reversed if this nation once again returns to The Bible as the foundation of our legal system and the governing of our nation.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
